name: devon-scuba-gear
effect: Worn by the player while underwater via Dive in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.
short_effect: Worn by the player while underwater.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A device made by Devon Corporation that provides oxygen to users during the use of Dive.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A device made by Devon Corporation that provides oxygen to users during the use of Dive.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A device made by Devon Corporation that provides oxygen to users during the use of Dive.
